name: Herd Community: Escape to the Oasis
name_original: Herd Community: Escape to the Oasis
description:
Instructions:
Move with WASD or arrows. Follow the Herd. Avoid the Cheetah.

You're a zebra, and you must rely on herd immunity to keep yourself safe from predators. Hopefully you can get to the oasis before you're eaten!

Team:

  • Peter - Lead Programmer, Google Doc Nitpicker
  • Sean - Programmer, Game Designer, Project Manager
  • NachoEd - 2D Artist, Character Designer, Animator
  • Tanya - Lead Artist, 3D Artist, Researcher

Made as part of the IVGDA Virtual Jam.
